data.question: What is the primary component of natural gas that porous metal-organic frameworks (MOFs) are used to store?
Which MOF has been demonstrated by BASF for use in model vehicles fueled with natural gas?
data.answer: MOF materials without specifying a particular type

data.question: What is the volumetric methane storage capacity of UTSA-76a at 298 K and 65 bar?
How does the working capacity of UTSA-76a compare to that of HKUST-1 for methane storage?
data.answer: UTSA-76a has a higher methane storage working capacity than HKUST-1

data.question: What role do the dynamic pyrimidine groups within UTSA-76a play in its methane storage capacity?
data.answer: They adjust their orientations to optimize methane packing at high pressure

data.question: Is the BET surface area of UTSA-76a comparable to that of NOTT-101a?
Does the introduction of pyrimidine groups into the organic linker alter the overall MOF pore structure of UTSA-76a compared to NOTT-101a?
What is the significance of the rotational barrier of the pyrimidine ring in UTSA-76a for methane storage?
data.answer: The lower rotational barrier of the pyrimidine ring in UTSA-76a allows for more dynamic adjustment and better methane packing at high pressure

data.question: What experimental technique was used to confirm the higher rotational freedom of the central pyrimidine rings in UTSA-76a?
Is the volumetric methane storage capacity of UTSA-76a at 298 K and 65 bar higher than that of NOTT-101a?
What is the method used for synthesizing the organic linker H4L for UTSA-76?
What is the activation process for UTSA-76 before methane storage capacity testing?
data.answer: Guest-exchange with dry acetone, followed by degassing at room temperature and then at 373K

data.question: Does UTSA-76a exhibit a higher methane uptake at 65 bar and 298 K compared to NOTT-101a?
What is the role of the BET surface area and pore volume in determining the methane storage capacities of MOF materials?
data.answer: They are crucial for optimizing volumetric methane storage capacities by balancing porosities and framework densities

data.question: Was the crystal structure of UTSA-76 determined using single-crystal X-ray diffraction analysis?
What is the crystal system of UTSA-76 according to the single-crystal X-ray diffraction analysis?
Does the presence of pyrimidine groups in UTSA-76a contribute to its exceptionally high methane storage and working capacity?
What is the significance of the initial Qst value for methane adsorption in UTSA-76a compared to NOTT-101a?
data.answer: It indicates the strength of methane adsorption, with UTSA-76a having a slightly higher Qst value at high methane loading

data.question: What is the formula weight of UTSA-76 as determined from single-crystal X-ray diffraction analysis?
Is the framework density of UTSA-76a without guest molecules and terminal waters provided in the supplementary information?
